message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats into our profits.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I need a bit more than $40 to make it worthwhile for me. Let's split it 55/45.
Bob, time is money, and it's losing value fast. I'll take a slight hit and accept the $55/$45 split, but that's my final offer.
